text: The Young Magician (; ) is a 1987 Canadian Polish fantasy movie directed by Waldemar Dziki and is the fourth movie in the Tales for All series. It stars Rusty Jedwab, Eduard Garson, Michał Szewczyk, Władysław Kowalski, Andrzej Szczepkowski, Andrzej Blumenfeld, Piotr Polk, Zbigniew Suszyński. ==Other websites== * Category:1987 fantasy movies Category:Canadian fantasy movies Category:Polish movies
title: The Young Magician (movie)
